name: css-background-clip
description: Css module of single purpose classes for background clip

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-background-clip.css > css/css-background-clip.css && tachyons src/css-background-clip.css --minify > css/css-background-clip.min.css && tachyons src/css-background-clip.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
